welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Teaneck, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant community! Get ready to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to American Airlines, JetBlue, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to Alaska Airlines, Southwest Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device per day. Premium WiFi available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport offers luxury services for private aircraft.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international airlines such as Air France, Japan Airlines, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, and Singapore Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves international airlines such as British Airways, Qantas, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Limited free access, paid options available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
